title: Pony Boy is born
content: Do yourself a favour and please do check this [astonishingly beautiful birth announcement](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018113124/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=266). And if you want to comment, please do so on Unzipped -- I'm sure Kristof will appreciate it. :^)
author: Bald Condensed
